attributes.action: Theresa May should resign as the Prime Minister.
attributes.background: At a time when the country is searching for answers on Brexit, her lack of negotiating skills, lack of leadership and lack of accountability to the people who voted in the GE of 2017 has pushed this country into a constitutional crisis that cannot be resolved whilst she remains in office.

rejection.details: The resignation of the Prime Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
